column1: You put in the garbage can that was a special filing cabinet.
I have an important question for you.
Are you going to Angelas cat party on Sunday?

I dont think it would be the worst thing if they let me go because then I might... I dont think its many little girls dream to be a receptionist. I like to do illustrations. Um... Mostly watercolor. A few oil pencil. Um, Jim thinks theyre good.
You just still have these messages from yesterday.
I was in the meeting with Jan and she did say that it could be this branch that gets the axe.
Jim said mixed berries? Well, yeah, hes on to me. Um...
So when are we going out?
Roys my fiance. Weve been engaged about three years. We were supposed to get married in September but I think were gonna get married in the spring.
Do you mind if I go out for a drink with these guys?
OK. Im gonna be a few minutes. So its only twenty past five. I still have to do my faxes.
Stealing? What am I supposed to have stolen?
Post-it Notes? What are those worth, 50 cents?
I cant believe this. I mean I have never even stolen as much as a paperclip and youre firing me.
Good. I thought you were going out for a drink with...
Yeah. Listen, have a nice weekend.
Im saving that cause I like it when the cards go T-ts-ts-tch-tch-tch.
OK. If I have to do this, based on stereotypes that are totally untrue, that I do not agree with, you would maybe not be  a very good driver.
Oh, do you want me to repeat the messages that I gave you before for the...
Actually, people are really unhappy. Um, Dwight sent around this memo and people are freaking out cause the...
OK. Dwight. Are you really in charge of picking the health care plan?
This is a ridiculously awful plan. Because you cut everything.
Why would you want to raise your cholesterol?
Dwights health care memo. I told you about it.
So, lets say my teeth turn to liquid and then, they drip down the back of my throat. What would you call that?
Um, Im not bothering you, am I?
You dont have anything youre doing?
Oh great. Um, no, this weekend? Nothing. Im not really doing anything.
I might go to the mall.
Why did you put Dwight in charge of that? He did a horrible job.
Um... Actually, we dont have any staff birthdays coming up.
Okay, umm... that would be Meredith.
But its not until next month.
You still want to have a party?
This was tough. I suggested we flip a coin. But Angela said she doesnt like to gamble. Of course by saying that she was gambling that I wouldnt smack her.
Hey, Jim, can I talk to you for a second?
Um, I dont know, Im just like, Im going a little crazy cause I keep overhearing all these conversations between Michael and corporate about like, staff issues?

Yeah, hes making me take notes on these meetings and Im, like, "These people are my friends." But hes all like, "This is confidential. You cant tell anybody." But I just feel like I want to... aaah. Just promise me youre not gonna say anything.

Hey where are you? Yeah, we were supposed to meet here. What? Oh my gosh! That ties in perfectly with something that Michael was telling me earlier! I just dont know what some of the people in, like, accounting are going to do? It said specifically that...
My fiance has plans for us this Saturday.  So I really hope that Dwight doesnt make me work. Maybe I should sleep with him? Im kidding, kidding. Totally kidding.
No, no, I know that the warrantys expired, but isnt it supposed to last longer than two years if it isnt defective? OK, fine, three years.
Please dont throw garbage at me.
I dont think so Michael. Besides, I cant cheer against my fiance.
Yeah, Im just forwarding the phones.
Im just saying, Roy is very competitive.
And he wants to take the WaveRunners to the lake this Saturday so...
Um, I think Im gonna be up at the lake.
Yeah, hes, uh, pretty good, huh?  Lets get you into a tub.
Theres a person here who wants to sell handbags.
Okay, I told her youd talk to her.
Theres an HR meeting in there at 1130.
Thats a very rude thing to say, Kevin.
Its nice having Katy around. Its another person for Michael to um, interact with.
Oh definitely, definitely step in and out of it like that.
Oh, God. Its sad. Its so sad.
Yeah, I gave it to you.
Jim is a great guy. Hes like a brother to me.  Were like best friends in the office and I really hope he finds someone.
No, Im kidding. Um, so you got big plans this weekend?
What are you guys going to do?
I, I was gonna say, I think that um, were gonna help Roys cousin move.
